Contributor: Bancroft, Milton, artist.; Y.M.C.A., publisher.; Coquemer, printer.;
Note: Signed "Milton Bancroft." "Visa 16032" appears on the bottom of the illustration. Orientation: Vertical.
Description: Illustration shows the docks of Bordeaux where the Y.M.C.A. supplies landed. Text tells that it was illustrated by the Y.M.C.A. secretary.
